Title: Only You
Writer: Joseph Weisberg (creator), Bradford Winters, Sneha Koorse (staff writer), Mike Batistick (staff writer)
Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Holly Taylor, Keidrich Sellati
Plot: After Amador's murder the FBI begins a massive manhunt for the killer. When they start closing in on Gregory, the KGB decides to send him to Moscow. Despite Elizabeth's best efforts he refuses to go, even if it means his life.
